name: Coolmath Games
description:
If you love CoolmathGames.com, you’ll love this app – hundreds of our favorite games made especially for mobile.

It’s all FREE, and we add new games every week! These games are fun + smart – they’re super fun to play, but also require a lot of thinking, strategy and logic.

Also, of course, there’s no violence, empty action, or inappropriate language – just a wide range of challenges that’ll make you forget you're getting a mental workout!

Escaping pigs, flying zombies, a bear who loves riding scooters, and much much more!

Games include:
* Parking Fury
* Bob the Robber To Go
* IQ Ball
* Block the Pig
* Checkers
* 2048
* Toy Defense

Enjoy!
